sys_ux_macroponent.name: portal-landing
sys_ux_macroponent.required_translations: [{"message":"Heads up","comment":""},{"message":"Close this report","comment":""},{"message":"Report an emergency","comment":""},{"message":"Community Alerts","comment":""},{"message":"This needs your attention","comment":""},{"message":"Update your emergency status","comment":""},{"message":"Read","comment":""},{"message":"Close Test","comment":""},{"message":"Custom ok","comment":""},{"message":"Your status report","comment":""},{"message":"Link label","comment":""},{"message":"Your manager is requesting emergency status from you","comment":""},{"message":"COVID-19 pandemic: due to the raise in number in NM, please self report","comment":""},{"message":"Enter a label","comment":""},{"message":"No content to display","comment":""}]
